snippet.title: Necro Story - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo and wishlist Necro Story now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/968800/Necro_Story/
Join Rablo Games' Discord channel: https://discord.gg/EsWVYEgnRM

Necro Story is a comedy RPG where you play as a powerful and (kind of) evil Necromancer. Helped by the ghost of a playful white mage, you must sneak into the Underworld to save humanity. Cast powerful spells, raise armies of skeletons, sign Dark Pacts and capture dead enemies' souls to take control of them.

Necro Story will be released for PC, PS5, Xbox Series and Nintendo Switch in September 2024.
